thread.title: Man City captain Vincent Kompany ruled out of Huddersfield trip
thread.title_full: Man City captain Vincent Kompany ruled out of Huddersfield trip

title: Man City captain Vincent Kompany ruled out of Huddersfield trip
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Saturday 18 Feb 2017 1:55 pm Vincent Kompany has suffered an injury setback (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester City will be without Vincent Kompany for their FA Cup clash against Huddersfield after the defender was ruled out through injury. 
The Belgian was expected to start in what would be only his seventh appearance of the season under Pep Guardiola. 
However, Kompany missed training on Friday and has been forced into pulling out of the game at the Kirklees Stadium. Kompany’s made just six appearances this term (Picture: Getty) 
Kompany’s struggled with injuries again this term and has made just three appearances in the Premier League all season. 
Though Kompany’s injury is not thought to be anything major, it’s another setback for the 30-year-old.
